column4: ï»¿can anyone help me? frostwire quit working on me so i took it off, some people recommended Deluge, so i got that working. Did a search it opens up mininova with my results but when i try to download something it asks me which program to open with, which is currently set to transmission, i tried to click other program but can't find Deluge in the filesystem, can anyone tell me where it'd be installed or any music downloading prog
click to select other program...then type /usr/bin/deluge
